title: Print the word with odd letters forming a pattern (e.g., PROGRAM)
description: Print the word with odd letters forming a pattern. For example, for PROGRAM: P      P, R    R, O  O, G, R  R, A    A, M      M

title: Print a diamond pattern for given input size
description: Print a diamond pattern with asterisks for a given size N. For N=3: *, ***, *****, ***, *

title: Print a number pattern in triangle form
description: Print a number pattern in triangle form with specific numbering sequence

title: Print a snake pattern without using arrays
description: Given N, print a snake pattern (say N = 4): 1 2 3 4, 8 7 6 5, 9 10 11 12, 16 15 14 13. Must not use arrays (1D or 2D).

title: Print Latin Matrix without using strings or arrays
description: Given N, print a Latin Matrix (say N = 3): A B C, B C A, C A B. Must not use strings, arrays (1D/2D), or inbuilt functions.

title: Print pattern with alternating characters (Hce akr from Hacker)
description: Sample Input: Hacker, Rank. Sample Output: Hce akr, Rn ak

title: Print word from middle (e.g., PROGRAM from G)
description: Given an odd length word, print it from the middle. Example: Input PROGRAM, Output: G, GR, GRA, GRAM, GRAMP, GRAMPR, GRAMPRO

title: Print binary pattern (000, 001, 010, etc.)
description: For input N, print all binary combinations: For N=2: 00, 01, 10, 11. For N=3: 000, 001, 010, 011, 100, 101, 110, 111

title: Print Pascal's triangle pattern
description: Print Pascal's triangle for given input size. For INPUT 5: 1, 1 1, 1 2 1, 1 3 3 1, 1 4 6 4 1

title: Find the maximum of three numbers
description: Find and return the maximum among three given numbers

title: Print total number of odd and even digits in a number
description: Ex. Input: 1234567, Output: ODD 4, EVEN 3

title: Find second maximum from array
description: Find the second maximum element in an array. Handle cases where all elements are same or only one element exists.

title: Find whether a number is palindrome without using arrays or strings
description: Check if a given number is a palindrome without using arrays or strings

title: Check if a number is a twisted prime number
description: A twisted prime is a prime number whose reverse is also prime. Input: 97, Output: Twisted Prime (97 and 79 both prime)

title: Print n prime numbers
description: Print the first n prime numbers

title: Sort array based on minimum prime factor
description: Sort the array elements based on their minimum prime factor

title: Add a digit to all digits of a number
description: Adding a digit to all the digits of a number. Ex: digit=4, number=2875, output=612119

title: Check if number 'a' is present in another number 'b'
description: Check if all digits of number 'a' are present in number 'b' in the same order

title: Find next smallest palindrome
description: Given a number, find the next smallest palindrome greater than this number

title: Calculate sin(x) using series expansion
description: Calculate sin(x) using the series expansion: sin(x) = x - x^3/3! + x^5/5! - ... Input x=30, n=10, Output=0.5

title: Multiply two numbers using only + operator
description: Multiply two numbers using only the + operator with minimum iterations. Input: 3, 4, Output: 12

title: Find minimum count to represent N as sum of numbers with only 0s and 1s
description: Given N, find minimum count where N = x1 + x2 + ... xn, where xi has only 0s and 1s. Ex: N=33, Output: 3 (11+11+11)

title: Replace every element with the greatest element on right side
description: Replace every element with the next greatest element on the right side. Last element becomes -1. Ex: {16,17,4,3,5,2} -> {17,5,5,5,2,-1}

title: Find equilibrium index of an array
description: Find index where sum of left elements equals sum of right elements. Ex: {-7,1,5,2,-4,3,0}, Output: 3

title: Alternate sorting (largest, smallest, 2nd largest, 2nd smallest)
description: Rearrange array alternating between largest and smallest. Input: {1,2,3,4,5,6,7}, Output: {7,1,6,2,5,3,4}

title: Sort array - odd ascending, even descending
description: Sort odd numbers in ascending and even numbers in descending order. Input: 5 8 11 6 2 1 7, Output: 1 5 7 11 8 6 2

title: Find array element with equal sum on both sides
description: Find element where sum of left side equals sum of right side. Input: 1,2,3,7,6, Output: 7 (1+2+3=6)

title: Find extra element and its index between two arrays
description: Find the extra element and its index. Input: [10,20,30,12,5], [10,5,30,20], Output: 12 at index 4

title: Find least prime to make elements divisible
description: Find least prime that when added to first array element makes it divisible by second array element. Input: [20,7], [11,5], Output: [1,3]

title: Sort by frequency of occurrence in descending order
description: Sort elements by frequency (descending), then by value (ascending) for same frequency. Input: [2,2,3,4,5,12,2,3,3,3,12], Output: 3 3 3 3 2 2 2 12 12 4 5

title: Print second frequently occurring number
description: Find second most frequent number. Input: 1 1 2 3 1 2 4, Output: 2 (1 occurs 3 times, 2 occurs 2 times)

title: Print only Fibonacci numbers from array
description: Filter and print only Fibonacci numbers. Input: 2 10 4 8, Output: 2 8. Input: 1 10 6 8 13 21, Output: 1 8 13 21

title: Find maximum sum contiguous subarray (Kadane's Algorithm)
description: Find maximum sum of contiguous subarray. Ex: {-2,-3,4,-1,-2,1,5,-3}, Output: 7 (elements [4,-1,-2,1,5])

title: Find maximum sum contiguous subarray without negatives
description: Find largest sum contiguous subarray with no negative numbers. Array: {-2,7,5,-1,3,2,9,-7}, Output: Sum=14, Elements: 3,2,9

title: Rearrange array: 1st largest, 1st smallest, 2nd largest, etc.
description: Rearrange array in form: 1st_largest, 1st_smallest, 2nd_largest, 2nd_smallest, 3rd_largest...

title: Sort by number of factors in descending order
description: Sort array elements in descending order based on the number of factors each element has

title: Find next greater element for each element
description: Find next greater element for each element. Input: {6,3,9,10,8,2,1,15,7}, Output: {7,5,10,15,9,3,2,_,8}

title: Find top three repeated numbers
description: Find the three most frequently occurring numbers. Input: {3,4,2,3,16,3,15,16,15,15,16,2,3}, Output: 3, 16, 15

title: Print longest continuous range from unsorted array
description: Find longest continuous range. Input: 1 3 10 7 9 2 4 6, Output: 1 2 3 4

title: Find union of two arrays
description: Find union of two arrays (unique elements). Input: [1,2,3,4,5,3], [1,2,7,5], Output: 1 2 3 4 5 7

title: Remove duplicates from array
description: Remove duplicate elements from array. Input: 1 1 2 4, Output: 1 2 4

title: Form largest k-digit number from array elements
description: Form largest k-digit number. Input: [1,4,973,97], k=3, Output: 974. Input: [1,4,89,73,9,7], k=5, Output: 98973

title: Find maximum in sliding window
description: Find maximum in each sliding window. Input: [1,3,5,2,1,8,6,9], k=3, Output: 5 5 5 8 8 9

title: Double consecutive numbers and shift zeros to end
description: If consecutive numbers are same, double first and make second 0, then shift all 0s to end. Input: {2,2,0,4,0,8}, Output: 4 4 8 0 0 0

title: Find pair with given sum in array
description: Find all pairs with given sum. Input: {1,2,4,3,5,6}, SUM=5, Output: 2 (pairs: (1,4) & (2,3))

title: Compute maximum for each integer by sum or product of digits
description: For each integer, choose max of sum or product of digits. Input: [120,24,71,10,59], Output: [3,8,8,1,45]

title: Find all subsets with given sum
description: Find all subsets that sum to N. Input: {2,3,5,8,10}, N=10, Output: {2,3,5}, {2,8}, {10}

title: Find safe position in circular queue (Josephus problem)
description: Circular queue of processes, skip every kth process. Find safe position. Input: N=5, start=3, skip=2nd, Output: 1

title: Find minimum bike trips given weights and capacity
description: Given person weights and bike capacity (max 2 persons), find minimum trips. Infinite bikes available.

title: Form largest number using array of numbers
description: Form the largest possible number by concatenating array elements. Use custom sorting.

title: Find all permutations of a string (backtracking)
description: Find all permutations of a string using backtracking approach

title: Print all distinct permutations with duplicate characters
description: Find all distinct permutations of a string that may contain duplicate characters

title: Word segmentation using dictionary
description: Check if string can be segmented into dictionary words. Dictionary: {i,like,sam,sung,samsung,mobile}. Input: 'ilikesamsung', Output: Yes

title: Wildcard pattern matching
description: Match text with wildcard pattern. '?' matches single char, '*' matches any sequence. Text='baaabab', Pattern='*****ba*****ab', Output: true

title: Decode digit sequence (1=A, 2=B, etc.)
description: Decode digit sequence where 1=A, 2=B, ..., 26=Z. How many ways to decode? Input: '121', Output: 3 (ABA, AU, LA)

title: Count possible decodings of digit sequence
description: Count number of ways to decode digit sequence. Input: '1234', Output: 3 (ABCD, LCD, AWD)

title: Print all possible words from phone digits
description: Generate all possible words from phone digit mapping (like old phone keypads)

title: Print all codes from number (1=a, 26=z)
description: Generate all possible codes. Input: 1123, Output: {1,1,2,3}=aabc, {11,2,3}=kbc, {1,1,23}=aaw, {11,23}=kw

title: Reverse words in string using recursion
description: Reverse word order using recursion. Input: 'one two three', Output: 'three two one'

title: Find all combinations for given sum (order maintained)
description: Find all combinations for sum N, maintain order. Input: 8 3 4 7 9, N=7, Output: {3,4}, {7}

title: Remove duplicates in string with replacement logic
description: Remove duplicates with special replacement. Input: Java1234, Output: Javb1234. Input: aBuzZ9900, Output: aBuzC9012 (complex replacement rules)

title: Compare version numbers (upgrade/downgrade)
description: Compare versions and determine upgrade/downgrade. Input: v1=4.8.2, v2=4.8.4, Output: upgraded

title: Reverse words from first occurrence maintaining spaces
description: Reverse words from first occurrence of String2, maintain spaces. Input: 'This is a test String only', 'st', Output: 'This is a only String test'

title: Reverse string keeping special characters intact
description: Reverse string but keep special characters at same positions. Input: 'house no : 123@ cbe', Output: 'ebc32 1o : nes@ uoh'

title: Check if string is palindrome with special characters
description: Check palindrome ignoring spaces and special chars. Ex: 'RACE CAR', 'I DID, DID I ?'. No arrays/extra space.

title: Pangram checking (all alphabets present)
description: Check if all English alphabets are present. Input: 'abc defGhi JklmnOP QRStuv wxyz', Output: True

title: Password strength checker
description: Check password strength based on 4 rules (length, uppercase, lowercase, digits, special chars). Output: Weak/Medium/Good/Strong

title: First occurrences of characters between strings
description: Find first occurrence of each char of s2 in s1, print range. Input: 'ZOHOCORPORATION', 'PORT', Output: 'OHOCORPORAT' (indices 1-11)

title: Remove characters from s1 present in s2
description: Remove all characters from s1 that are in s2. Input: s1='expErIence', s2='En', Output: s1='exprIece'

title: Remove palindrome words from sentence
description: Remove palindrome words. Input: 'He did a good deed', Output: 'He good'. Input: 'Hari speaks malayalam', Output: 'Hari speaks'

title: Print longest sequence between same characters
description: Find longest distance between same characters. Input: 'abcccccbba', Output: 8 (a to a). Input: 'aaaaaaaa', Output: 6

title: Find anagrams in array for given word
description: Find anagrams of given word in array. Input: ['catch','got','tiger','mat','eat','Pat','tap','tea'], word='ate', Output: eat, tea

title: Lexicographic sorting
description: Sort strings in lexicographic (dictionary) order

title: Print true if second string is substring with wildcard
description: Check if s2 is substring of s1 with wildcard. '*' can replace n chars. Input: 'Spoon', 'Sp*n', Output: TRUE

title: Reverse only vowels in string
description: Reverse only vowels, keep consonants in place. Input: 'abcdef', Output: 'ebcdaf'

title: Find words in matrix (right, down, diagonal)
description: Search words from dictionary in matrix (right, down, diagonal). Dictionary: {van,zoho,love,are,is}

title: Form lines using words with character limit
description: Form lines with max chars, favorite char doesn't count, words can't break. Input: max=10, fav='o', words=['Zoho','Eating','Watching','Pogo','Loving','Mango']

title: Modify Boolean matrix - make adjacent cells 0
description: If matrix cell mat[i][j]=1, make adjacent cells 0

title: MS-Paint bucket fill algorithm
description: Implement flood fill algorithm. Replace color of pixel and all adjacent same-colored pixels with new color (like MS-Paint bucket tool)

title: Print matrix in ZIG-ZAG fashion
description: Print matrix in zig-zag diagonal order. Input: [[1,2,3],[4,5,6],[7,8,9]], Output: 1 2 4 7 5 3 6 8 9

title: Print matrix diagonal sum (largest triangle)
description: Given matrix, print larger sum of two triangles split by diagonal (top-right to bottom-left)

title: Matrix addition of variable length arrays
description: Given n arrays of different sizes, find addition treating as rows. Input: 4, [3,5,4,2], [2,4,5], [4,5,6,7,8], [4,9,2,1], [1,2], Output: 50856

title: Find rectangle in matrix and its sum
description: Print rectangle formed by given indices and its sum. Input: matrix, indices (2,0) and (3,4), Output: rectangle and sum=54

title: Find number of islands in matrix
description: Count islands in matrix where -1=ocean, 1=land. Connected 1s form an island

title: NxN matrix pathfinding (0=block, 1=path)
description: Find path from (0,0) to (N-1,N-1) where 0=block, 1=path. Can only move right or down. Print one valid path.

title: Find shortest path in matrix (right and down only)
description: Find shortest path from one element to another using only right and down moves

title: Print unique rows in matrix
description: Print matrix without duplicate rows. Input: [[1,0,1],[1,1,0],[1,1,1],[1,0,1]], Output: [[1,0,1],[1,1,0],[1,1,1]]

title: Track grid position after movements (L/R/U/D)
description: Given initial position (x,y) and movements (L/R/U/D), find final position. Input: (4,5), 9 moves: U L R R D D U L R, Output: (5,5)

title: Insert 0 after consecutive K 1s in bit array
Find total days between two dates
description: Calculate days between two dates considering leap years. Input: 10-Feb-2014 to 10-Mar-2015, Output: 393

title: Implement LRU (Least Recently Used) cache
description: Implement LRU cache with capacity 10. If cache full and new key added, remove least recently used item

title: Find children at given level in family tree
description: Given parent-child pairs and a person with level, find count of children at that level. Input: pairs, 'Syam', level=2, Output: 3

title: Count occurrences of each number
description: Count frequency of each element. Input: {2,3,2,6,1,6,2}, Output: 1-1, 2-3, 3-1, 6-2

title: Find minimum of greater numbers for each element
description: For each element, find minimum of all greater elements. Array: {2,3,7,-1,8,5,11}, Output: {2->3, 3->5, 7->8, -1->2, 8->11, 5->7, 11->}

title: Check valid chess board configuration (9 knights)
description: Given 5x5 chess board with 9 knights, check if configuration is valid (no knight attacks another)

title: Build two towers with blocks to desired heights
description: Given 6 blocks, build 2 towers using 3 blocks each to reach desired heights. Input: blocks=[1,2,5,4,3,6], heights=[6,15], Output: 1 2 3 & 4 5 6

title: Remove digits iteratively until list is empty
description: Given set of numbers and digit in each iteration, remove digit occurrences until list empty
